text: #AskDrH @DrHilaryJones Confused If not a #coronaviruscure why is a) #chloroquine included in Chinese treatment guidelines https://t.co/fJ1FZcm449 b) Canadian hospital using it c) NY to treat patients with it from tomorrow d) lots of Australian hospitals want to join trial there? https://t.co/nEBU0YZMY5
